event.title: 2011 the population was 1,174, almost 100 higher than the 1,078 counted

data.event: In 2011 the population was 1,174, almost 100 higher than the 1,078 counted at the time of the 2001 census.
In 2011 the population was 1,174, almost 100 higher than the 1,078 counted at the time of the 2001 census.

event.title: was erected during the (Marian year) of 1954

data.event: The highest elevation on the island is Heaval, halfway up which is located a prominent white marble statue of the Madonna and Child, called "Our Lady of the Sea", which was erected during the (Marian year) of 1954.
